result.title: American Cinematheque: Ridley Scott Q&A
result.overview: This 16-minute Ridley Scott Q&A session was recorded September 14, 2001 and moderated by Dennis Bartok, following a showing of Alien at the American Cinematheque.

result.title: An Introduction to David Lynch
result.overview: "An Introduction to David Lynch" is a featurette originally released in the 2001 DVD release, Twin Peaks: The First Season.  It features interviews with Catherine E. Coulson, Charles Ramirez-Borg, Lesli Linka Glatter, Miguel Ferrer, Michael J. Anderson, Kyle MacLachlan, Duwayne Dunham, Sheryl Lee, Peggy Lipton, and Richard Beymer, each discussing the filmmaking processes and methods of Twin Peaks co-creator David Lynch.

result.title: Histories from Argentina En Vivo
result.overview: Thirteen short films directed by thirteen directors, based on the recitals of Argentino en Vivo 2.
